title: Whitebait & Tofu
description: A story of erotic and philosophic intrigue. Photographer, Sam Leinster is a lost soul living in the big city. Then a mysterious, beautiful Japanese woman enters his life and everything changes. He is caught up in an intricate web of deceit and subterfuge. But who exactly are the conspirators? What are they trying to do? Whose side is he on? This is a crisp-as-haiku tale of love and sex and death.
author: Jonathan Chamberlain
